text:
The Apache SSL FAQ mentions cURL and links to <http://curl.haxx.nu/>. That
address will redirect your browser to <http://www.tetrapod.com/>, a web site
completely unrelated to cURL. The correct URL for cURL is <http://curl.haxx.se/>.
creator: jonatan@wineasy.se
erik@codefaktor.de
text:
Fixed in the next release.

Thanks reporting this and the other issues and thanks for using Apache 2.0!
